title: Summoner 6
description: Free from the Shadowscape, Gryff returns to the world only to find two months have passed him by, but it’s nothing compared to what’s in store for him next.  Gryff has his hands full between Enclaves falling, undead bounty hunters hell bent on revenge, and oh yeah, the council is out to get him, too.  But Gryff has become more powerful, and none of his enemies can predict what he is now capable of.
author: Eric Vall
